metadata.title: USN-3748-1 -- base-files vulnerability
metadata.description: Sander Bos discovered that the MOTD update script incorrectly handled temporary files. A local attacker could use this issue to cause a denial of service, or possibly escalate privileges if kernel symlink restrictions were disabled.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3748-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  lsb-release-udeb - 10.1ubuntu2.2 base-files - 10.1ubuntu2.2 No subscription required
